constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 68 (Tuesday, April 20, 2021)]
[House]
[Pages H1998-H1999]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. ARMSTRONG:
H.R. 2671.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
[[Page H1999]]
Article I, Section 8, clause 3 ``to regulate commerce with
foreign nationa, and among the several states, and with the
Indian tribes;''

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Consumer Protection and Commerce.

title: SHIELD Act
